answers.answer: If you have that symptoms, how could you be able to write this question?

Could be blood sugar related, but it could be a million other things. Keep it simple at first. You could be showing signs of diabetes or it could be hypo or hyperglycemia. Test your blood sugar or have your Dr. test it.
you might want to check with the dr. that sounds like signs of vertigo.

question: I took a nap yesterday, feeling just fine. When I woke up I felt dizzy, as the day went on I stayed in bed, feeling drunk, spinning, and could not walk. I tried getting up a few times and almost fell. Now today iy has not changed any. I feel like my eyes are going back and forth, not allowing me to focus on anything! What could this be?
title: Can not focus, feeling drunk
